products.title: The Master and Margarita
products.description: One of the great masterpieces of the 20th century, Mikhail Bulgakov’s The Master and Margarita is beautifully crafted as a unique Folio edition with illustrations by Peter Suart and an introduction by Orlando Figes.
products.author: Mikhail Bulgakov

products.title: Sherlock Holmes
products.description: A stunning new Folio Society collection of Arthur Conan Doyle’s most compelling cases, The Selected Adventures and Memoirs of Sherlock Holmes is given a contemporary twist with Max Löffler’s unsettling illustrations.
products.author: Conan Doyle

products.title: Dun
products.description: This collector’s edition of Frank Herbert’s phenomenal tale of far-future desert warriors, fallible messiahs and interplanetary intrigue is illustrated by award-winning artist Sam Weber, and published to celebrate the 50th anniversary of the world’s best-selling science-fiction title.
products.author: Franklin Patrick Herbert

products.title: Howl’s Moving Castle
products.description: This fantastical Folio edition of Diana Wynne Jones’s enchanting tale features artwork by Folio’s 2019 Book Illustration Competition winner.
products.author: Dianna Winny

products.title: The Great Gatsby
products.description: F. Scott Fitzgerald’s enduring classic The Great Gatsby is beautifully presented as a Folio Society edition that includes a personal note by Francis Ford Coppola and exquisite artwork by Sam Wolfe Connelly.
products.author: Francis Scott

products.title: Breakfast at Tiffany’s
products.description: Capote’s enchanting New York novella, introduced by Jay McInerney. With illustrations by Karen Klassen.
products.author: Truman Capote

products.title: The Hobbit
products.description: A beautiful edition of Tolkien’s classic children’s story. Leaving his comfortable hobbit hole Bilbo Baggins goes on a reluctant adventure to defeat a dragon, and along the way he encounters the vile, but pathetic Gollum, and his ‘Precious’ – a ring to rule them all.
products.author: John Ronald Reuel

products.title: Alice in Wonderland
products.description: The Folio Society presents a glorious new edition of Lewis Carroll’s immortal tale, illustrated by acclaimed artist Charles van Sandwyk.
products.author: children's literature
